explains: n. 监视；监视哨；警戒；守望者；担心的事；前景
wordGroup: on the lookout for 寻找；注意；警戒
be on the lookout 注意...

sentences.en: He denied that he'd failed to keep a proper lookout that night.
sentences.cn: 他否认那天晚上他未能小心警戒。

sentences.en: He kept a sharp lookout for any strangers.
sentences.cn: 他警惕地守望着，不放过任何一个陌生人。

sentences.en: If he wants to waste his money, that's his lookout.
sentences.cn: 他要乱花钱，那是他自己的事。
